item.title: 消息人士称，波音公司和诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司本周等待美国海军下一代战斗机合同的签订
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，美国海军预计将于本周宣布谁将建造其下一代航母隐形战斗机--该项目在其生命周期内价值数千亿美元，是对抗中国计划的关键部分。【原文：The U.S. Navy is expected to announce this week who will build its next-generation carrier-based stealth fighter - a program worth hundreds of billions over its lifetime and a key part of plans to confront China, people familiar with the decision said.】

item.title: 独家：印度向三星提出 6.01 亿美元的电信进口征税要求
item.description: 一项政府命令显示，印度已责令三星及其在该国的高管补缴 6.01 亿美元的税款和罚款，原因是他们在进口关键电信设备时逃避关税，这是近年来最大的此类要求之一。【原文：India has ordered Samsung and its executives in the country to pay $601 million in back taxes and penalties for dodging tariffs on import of key telecoms equipment, a government order showed, for one of the biggest such demands in recent years.】

item.title: 贝莱德在欧洲推出首个比特币产品
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）在欧洲推出了首款比特币交易所交易产品，以满足新市场对加密货币日益增长的需求，此前贝莱德已在美国为类似产品吸引了超过 500 亿美元的资金。【原文：BlackRock has launched its first bitcoin exchange-traded product in Europe, in a bid to tap growing demand for cryptocurrency exposure in new markets after attracting more than $50 billion into similar products in the United States.】

item.title: 中国 DeepSeek 发布人工智能模型升级版，加剧与 OpenAI 的竞争
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 发布了其 V3 大型语言模型的重大升级版，加剧了与 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 等美国技术领导者的竞争。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek released a major upgrade to its V3 large language model, intensifying competition with U.S. tech leaders like OpenAI and Anthropic.】

item.title: 乐天卡瞄准 1,100 万亿日元利润，着眼于 1,100 万亿日元的 B2B 市场
item.description: 日本最大的信用卡公司乐天卡公司（Rakuten Card）的新任首席执行官表示，该公司的目标是在中期内将其年度营业利润几乎翻一番，达到 1000 亿日元（6.637 亿美元），并在很大程度上尚未开发的企业对企业支付市场中寻找机会。【原文：Japan's largest credit card company, Rakuten Card, is aiming to almost double its annual operating profit to 100 billion yen ($663.7 million) in the medium term and sees opportunity in expanding into the largely untapped business-to-business payments market, its new chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 大众将与法雷奥、Mobileye 合作开发驾驶辅助系统
item.description: 大众汽车周二表示，将与汽车零部件供应商法雷奥和 Mobileye 合作，为其汽车开发更好的驾驶辅助系统。【原文：Volkswagen said on Tuesday it would collaborate with automotive parts suppliers Valeo and Mobileye to develop better driver assistance systems for its cars.】

item.title: 独家新闻独家：印度希望削减 230 亿美元美国进口商品关税
item.description: 两位政府消息人士称，印度愿意在两国正在谈判的贸易协议的第一阶段削减价值 230 亿美元的一半以上美国进口商品的关税。【原文：India is open to cutting tariffs on more than half of U.S. imports worth $23 billion in the first phase of a trade deal the two nations are negotiating, two government sources said, the biggest cut in years, aimed at fending off reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 雷诺任命何塞普-玛丽亚-雷卡森斯（Josep Maria Recasens）为其电动汽车部门 Ampere 的新首席执行官
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺表示，何塞普-玛丽亚-雷卡森斯（Josep Maria Recasens）将于 4 月 1 日接替集团首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo），成为雷诺电动汽车部门 Ampere 的新任首席执行官。【原文：French carmaker Renault said Josep Maria Recasens would become the new CEO of Renault's electrical vehicles unit Ampere on April 1, replacing group CEO Luca de Meo in that role.】

item.title: TUI 航空业务中期利润率目标为 3
item.description: 欧洲最大的旅游运营商 TUI 周二在马德里举行的资本市场日之前表示，该公司的目标是在中期内将市场和航空部门的利润率提高到 3% 以上。【原文：Europe's largest tour operator TUI is aiming to expand its profit margin for its markets and airline unit to over 3% in the medium term, it said on Tuesday ahead of a capital markets day in Madrid.】

item.title: 01.AI 创始人李开复：DeepSeek 将中美人工智能差距缩小至三个月
item.description: 中国初创公司01.AI首席执行官李开复说，由于DeepSeek等公司研究出了如何更高效地使用芯片和应用算法，中国在某些领域已将与美国的人工智能发展差距缩小到仅三个月。【原文：China has narrowed the AI development gap with the United States to just three months in some areas, because firms such as DeepSeek have worked out how to use chips and apply algorithms more efficiently, the CEO of Chinese startup 01.AI Lee Kai-fu said.】

item.title: 壳牌提高股东分红，削减开支
item.description: 周二，壳牌将股东分配政策从占运营现金流的 30-40% 提高到 40-50%，重点关注股票回购，并将截至 2028 年的支出展望下调至 200 亿至 220 亿美元之间。【原文：Shell increased its shareholder distribution policy on Tuesday to 40-50% of cash flow from operations from 30-40% with a focus on share buybacks and lowered its spending outlook to a $20 billion-$22 billion range through to 2028.】

item.title: Holcim 分拆公司 Amrize 计划到 2028 年调整后息税折旧摊销前利润增长 8-11
item.description: Holcim 建筑材料公司周二表示，其北美分拆公司 Amrize 的目标是在 2025 年至 2028 年期间，调整后未计利息、税项、折旧及摊销前利润（EBITDA）的年增长率约为 8-11%。【原文：Holcim's North American spin-off Amrize is targeting annual growth in adjusted earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortisation (EBITDA) of about 8-11% between 2025 and 2028, the building materials company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普政策转向刺激欧洲采取行动，但任何 "欧洲狂热 "都为时尚早
item.description: 特朗普对关税的威胁和对美国未来在欧洲安全角色的质疑引起了强烈反响，德国计划斥资数千亿欧元用于国防和基础设施建设，这或许是最好的象征。【原文：Trump's threats on tariffs and questioning of America's future security role in Europe have drawn an energetic response, perhaps best symbolised by Germany's plans to spend hundreds of billions of euros on defence and infrastructure.】

item.title: 中国副总理在北京会见 Blackstone 主席
item.description: 据官方新华社周二报道，中国国务院副总理何立峰在北京会见了黑石集团董事长 Stephen Schwarzman，中方表示欢迎更多美国投资的企业和长期资本。【原文：China's Vice Premier He Lifeng met Blackstone's Chairman Stephen Schwarzman in Beijing, the official Xinhua news agency reported on Tuesday, stating that the Chinese side said it welcomed more U.S.-funded enterprises and long-term capital.】

item.title: 早间竞标救市反弹开始消退
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 特斯拉 2 月份欧洲市场份额下降，尽管电动车销量回升
item.description: 本周二的数据显示，尽管欧洲大陆电动汽车的总体注册量有所上升，但特斯拉 2 月份在欧洲的市场份额继续同比萎缩，因为这家纯电动汽车制造商的销量连续第二个月下滑。【原文：Tesla's market share in Europe continued to shrink year-on-year in February, data showed on Tuesday, as sales of the all-electric car maker dropped for a second consecutive month despite rising overall EV registrations on the continent.】

item.title: 特斯拉 2 月份欧洲市场份额下降，尽管电动车销量回升
item.description: 本周二的数据显示，尽管欧洲大陆的电动汽车总体注册量有所上升，但特斯拉 2 月份在欧洲的市场份额继续同比萎缩，因为这家纯电动汽车制造商的销量连续第二个月下滑。【原文：Tesla's market share in Europe continued to shrink year-on-year in February, data showed on Tuesday, as sales of the all-electric car maker dropped for a second consecutive month despite rising overall EV registrations on the continent.】

item.title: 政府消息人士称，印度拟取消对数字服务征收 6% 的均衡税
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的政府消息人士周二表示，作为《2025 年财政法案》修正案的一部分，印度计划取消对包括广告在内的在线服务征收 6% 的均衡税，该税率影响到 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌、Meta 和亚马逊等美国科技巨头。【原文：India plans to abolish a 6% equalisation levy on online services, including advertising, that affects U.S. tech giants such as Alphabet's Google, Meta and Amazon , as part of amendments to the Finance Bill 2025, a government source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国将在美国加征关税前调查 "韩国制造 "违规行为
item.description: 韩国海关总署（KCS）周二表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税之前，韩国将对违反与美国签订的自由贸易协定中有关原产国标记的行为展开特别调查。【原文：South Korea will launch a special probe into violations of the free trade pact with the United States regarding country of origin markings, the Korea Customs Service (KCS) said on Tuesday, ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 关税忧虑缓解，亚洲股市上涨；美元走强
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市跟随华尔街的脚步上涨，原因是美国加征关税的范围将小于预期，这提振了风险偏好，而在乐观的经济数据提供了一些安慰之后，美元在三周高点附近徘徊。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Tuesday, taking cues from the Wall Street, as the prospect of narrower-than-feared U.S. tariffs boosted risk appetite, while the dollar hovered near three-week highs after upbeat economic data provided some comfort.】

item.title: 投资者权衡特朗普关税影响，油价变化不大
item.description: 周二，油价几乎没有波动，因为投资者在权衡美国对从委内瑞拉购买石油和天然气的国家征收关税的影响，以及对汽车等行业征收关税对全球经济和石油需求的影响。【原文：Oil prices barely moved on Tuesday as investors weighed the impact of U.S. tariffs on countries buying oil and gas from Venezuela against the effect of tariffs on industries such as automobiles on the global economy and oil demand.】

item.title: 韩国将接待阿拉斯加州州长和能源团队，讨论天然气管道问题
item.description: 阿拉斯加州州长率领包括能源官员在内的阿拉斯加州代表将于周二访问韩国，届时有望与美国在亚洲的盟国举行会谈，以重振唐纳德-特朗普总统所吹捧的一个停滞不前的天然气项目。【原文：Alaskan state representatives led by the governor and including energy officials are due to visit South Korea on Tuesday, amid expectations of talks with U.S. allies in Asia to revive a stalled natural gas project touted by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴表示将在科技行业信心恢复的背景下开始重新招聘员工
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团主席蔡崇信周二表示，在与习近平主席会晤后，有明显迹象表明中国的商业企业家更加自信，阿里巴巴公司将重新开始招聘。【原文：Alibaba Group Chairman Joe Tsai said on Tuesday there were clear signs China's business entrepreneurs were more confident following a meeting with President Xi Jinping and that his company would re-commence hiring.】

item.title: 特朗普谈关税，数据提振美元
item.description: 周二早些时候，美元兑日元汇率创下三周新高，在一些强劲的美国服务业数据和关税方面的谨慎乐观情绪之后，美元全线走强。【原文：The dollar hit a three-week high on the yen early on Tuesday and was firm across the board after some strong U.S. services data and cautious optimism on the tariff front.】

item.title: 三星电子称联席首席执行官韩钟熙因心脏骤停去世
item.description: 韩国科技巨头三星电子周二表示，其联席首席执行官韩钟熙因心脏骤停去世。韩钟熙现年 63 岁。【原文：South Korean tech giant Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday that its co-CEO Han Jong-hee has died from cardiac arrest. Han was 63.】

item.title: 现代钢铁将在路易斯安那州建厂，年产量达 270 万吨
item.description: 韩国现代钢铁公司在周二提交的一份监管文件中表示，该公司将与现代汽车集团共同投资 58 亿美元，在美国路易斯安那州建设一座年产能达 270 万吨的工厂。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Steel will invest $5.8 billion along with Hyundai Motor Group to build a plant in Louisiana in the United States with an annual capacity of 2.7 million tonnes, the company said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 殖民地管道公司回应对汽油运输变更提议的抗议
item.description: 殖民地管道公司周一要求美国联邦能源管理委员会驳回托运人对其汽油运输方式拟议变更提出的抗议，辩称这些变更符合行业惯例，也在殖民地公司的权限范围之内。【原文：The Colonial Pipeline on Monday asked the U.S. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to reject shippers' protests over proposed changes to how it moves gasoline, arguing that the modifications are in line with industry practices and within Colonial's authority.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 以 60 亿美元的估值至少融资 7.5 亿美元
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 正在以 60 亿美元的投前估值筹集至少 7.5 亿美元。【原文：Quantum computing startup PsiQuantum is raising at least $750 million at a $6 billion pre-money valuation, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国小米拟配售融资 55 亿美元用于业务扩张
item.description: 中国小米公司（Xiaomi Corp）周二表示，该公司正寻求通过配售融资共426亿港元（54.8亿美元），以加速业务扩张。【原文：China's Xiaomi Corp said on Tuesday it is looking to raise an aggregate of HK$42.6 billion ($5.48 billion) via a placement in a bid to accelerate business expansion.】

item.title: Trump Media 与 Crypto.com 合作，在 Truth.Fi 上推出交易所交易基金
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的媒体公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）周一表示，它将与 Crypto.com 合作，通过其 Truth.Fi 品牌推出交易所交易基金和产品。【原文：President Donald Trump's media company Trump Media & Technology Group said on Monday it is partnering with Crypto.com to launch exchange-traded funds and products through its Truth.Fi brand.】
